attributes.action: Local council elections to be allowed for counties that couldnt last time in may
attributes.additional_details: As we couldnt last time due to restructring so we should be allowed this time
attributes.background: Allow the local elections to be held in May for all counties ie suffolk

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: 

Remove power to cancel local government elections

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/747234
